overview: Life in the modern office can be a stressful affair – too much to do, too little time to do it, and the pay’s almost always crap. But for executives like Daniel Prince, Kurt Maddox and Robbie Kasl all those hours spent at the desk are the perfect opportunity to indulge in their favourite hobbies, namely sucking cock and pounding ass! And with an array of monster dicks like this on the payroll who can fucking blame them? Life in the cut and thrust world of white collar fornication hasn’t looked this good in a long, long time ...
title: Executive Monsters
